event.title: FSFE at FrOSCon in Sankt Augustin, Deutschland

body.p: FSFE will be present at the Free and Open Source Software Conference (FrOSCon) with a booth, several talks and a reading:

ul.li: On 17.08 at 16:30h in room HS8: Johannes Näder, FSFE policy project manager, will give a talk on "It's not just about money!" ("Geld ist nicht alles!'"), explaining approaches for better Free Software procurement - .

On 17.08 at 17:45h in room HS8:Right afterwards, at 17:45h. and in the same room (HS8), Bernhard Reiter will encourage voluntary payments for Free Software in his talk "Just pay for it!!? - your Free Software!" ("Bezahlt sie doch einfach!!? - eure Freie Software") - .

On 17.08 at 14:00h in room HS6: as part of the children's programme, Isabel Drost-Fromm will read Matthias Kirschner's book "Ada and Zangemann - A Tale of Software, Skateboards, and Raspberry Ice Cream"- .
On 17.08 at 15:00hh in room C117,Guido Günther will give a Phosh status update in the "FOSS on mobile" project room - .
In the FSFE booth we will answer all your questions about the NGI Zero applications during the NGI0 Open Consultation Hour (time to be announced).

body.p: Our talks and most of the conference will be in German. You do not need to buy a ticket or register. Just drop by!
